sn56.59:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso himavato pabbatarajassa satta sasapamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhipeyya.
sn56.59:1.3: katamam nu kho bahutaram—ya va satta sasapamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhitta, ayam va himava pabbataraja”ti?
sn56.59:1.4: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaram, yadidam—himava pabbataraja; appamattika satta sasapamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhitta.
sn56.59:1.5: Sankhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhagampi na upenti himavantam pabbatarajanam upanidhaya satta sasapamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhitta”ti.
